item.description:
I'm frazzled. Sorry about the last minute change.

We need to discuss some other FPA business.

Possible frequent change for our RCO
CAP at FIT


This past Tuesday, we had a full schedule for our FPA meeting.

Since then, there has been a commission meeting that a lot of FPA members attended.

Seems everyone has a different take or more to add for the commission meeting.

There was an attorney there discussing legals and Gale assoc discussing the wind study.

Also, we, the FPA, have agreed to run the Safety Committee. We should set up a few people to discuss these issues. Ie, line painting, 32 has obstruction light poles unlit. And a few other safety issues.

bullock hangar, see you all then.

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA meeting updates RWY change/CAP/windstudy...
